channel.title: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?
channel.description: Lock, I got pretty good luls from ignorant 12 year olds.

item.title: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

pk2play:

Why would you want to hit a girl in the first place you dick?

Implying that females are incapable of cruelty or violence
This kind of thinking is what leads to “oh i’m a woman and i can get away with anything!” situations and if you try to say anything against the woman you get thrown in jail.
And if the woman in question is black…

Read full topic
item.source: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?

item.title: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk2 matiasmunk2
item.description:
@matiasmunk2 wrote:

I would fucking rape her until she dies…
Jk… I would probably ignore it at first, but if she did it again. I would get mad and yell “What the hell did you do that for”.
And if she keeps doing it I would probably push her away and call the cops so we could talk about…
If she keeps continuing after that, I would probably punch her in the stomach…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @oldskoolpk oldskoolpk
item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:407899”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=509185.msg3694151#msg3694151 date=1312322165]

Self defence.

This is what I thought, but when the girl takes pictures of the bruise you left, what can I do now?
[/quote]
Don’t hurt her enough to leave a mark, just bitch-slap her or push her, and be like " BITCH GTFO OR ILL DCLAW YOU"[/quote]

LOL

ExtremeX-Scape™:

Put on vengeance then take the stab.

LOOOOOOLOLOLOLOLOLo ahahahahhaahah

Read full topic

Also, you’d be surprised on what girls will say in court. They will usually have an advantage over you in court, because they are females (in a shitty court system atleast).[/quote]

item.source: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?

item.title: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Ghost in stack, post:38, topic:407899”][quote author=Rock N Rolla link=topic=509185.msg3694875#msg3694875 date=1312364147]
10. Men do not have Tourette Syndrome

I believe all women suffer from a mild and extremely localized form of Tourette Syndrome. The afflicted organ? Their tongues. That’s why women cannot shut their fucking mouths for ten seconds while adults are speaking around them. Their tongues are battling around in their mouths like drunken Vipers.

  1. Men are not sponges

Women are social chameleons — or better yet: social vampires. Women walk into a situation and before you know it they’ve completely changed their wardrobe and mannerisms as if they’ve joined a fucking cult. Men are not sheep. Everyone knows the word for a female sheep is ewe, but what about the male word? There isn’t one because sheep is something men are not.

  1. Women are racists

Women’s entire lives and social circles are based around hatred. Do they hate their boyfriends? Do they hate their wardrobe? Do they hate each other? Yes, yes and fuck definitely. Men don’t go in for that silly sort of nonsense. If we’re dissatisfied, we pick up and move out. Or we take our mighty man muscles and lift fucking mountains so the world looks exactly the way we want it to. Men do more world changing before 9:00 AM than any woman ever has done in her whole life.

  1. Men live less than women

The last thing a society needs is a bunch of non-contributing members laying around and sucking all the juice from the young. Men know this so they blast off from birth like shooting man stars — burning out ten years faster, but setting the whole night ablaze with manness.

  1. Men write illegibly

Writing is stupid and an ineffective way to communicate. Men know this so they don’t give a shit about handwriting things with big hoops and loops and squiggles and shit so aliens can read notes about remembering to pick up your birth control pills after 6th period from space.

  1. Jesus was a man

Whether or not you believe in Jesus, there is one fact you can’t argue with: he was a man. No religion anywhere has ever put a woman in charge of shit. That’s called dogma — man-dogma — and it means men are better than women.

  1. Men wear watches

Do you know why men wear watches? It’s because there’s a limited amount of time in the day and men need to know how much of it there is so they can efficiently allocate their man ass kicking for the day. Women don’t wear watches; they wear bracelets. Women wearing bracelets is like dropping a bus of retarded kids off in front of a taffy pulling machine. They can just stare for hours and never get bored.

A watch says, ‘Get up and go! Move your man ass and take care of your fucking man business!’ That’s why 60 minutes uses a ticking watch for its theme song. ‘Important shit is going down and we’re about to talk about it in a fucking fastidious manner, so get the fuck ready,’ says a ticking watch. A bracelet says, ‘You’re most likely ugly, but look at how much money you’re worth!’ What a joke.

  1. Boys destroy things

The only thing that has ever lifted our species out of the trees where we came from is our ability to destroy. Take paper: the cornerstone of the modern world. That was invented because man wanted to destroy trees and beat them into pulp. How about nuclear power? Men invented that too. Men are natural destructors. We pop right out of the man-womb and start on a life-long tirade of progress by tearing down the Earth with our mighty, man-manly man-fists. Goddammit, that’s awesome!

  1. Marriage is stupid

Marriage is 100% the fault of women. It was invented by men though! Did you know that? Marriage was invented because women were too busy whoring it out to fuck the only the guy who was paying their rent and feeding their fat asses French bon-bons every day. Men invented marriage as a way of telling women who they could and couldn’t fuck. Like everything else men have ever invented, it completely worked and worked way better than any man thought it would. Women became so indoctrinated by the man-invention of marriage that they’re fucking obsessed with it.

Marriage is still stupid. It’s a stupid game invented to entertain stupid minds and to teach basic lessons of fidelity that even invertebrates are born with.

  1. Men have penises

When it comes to being a man, being quick at identifying problems is tantamount to fixing them. In fact it’s tantamount-ier. Having a penis — in other words looking like a man and having man parts — is a man’s way of telling other men, ‘Hey. Look at me. I’m a man. I won’t fuck up whatever it is that you’re trying to do. If you need some help, maybe ask me and I’ll see if I can lend a man-hand. It’s the least I could do to be fucking courteous.’

Men Are Better Than Women.
[/quote]
LMFAO.[/quote]
Did you really have to quote that? Ahh what the fuck i gyes i will too

Read full topic
item.source: If a girl attacked me, can I fight back?

Men invented marriage as a way of telling women who they could and couldn’t fuck. Marriage is still stupid. It’s a stupid game invented to entertain stupid minds and to teach basic lessons of fidelity that even invertebrates are born with.

Men Are Better Than Women.[/quote]
LMFAO.
